About This Property
Don't miss this spacious 3 bed 2 bath apartment in Brookline's Coolidge Corner! This apartment features a spacious layout with an updated kitchen including stainless steel appliances (electric stovetop/ oven, refrigerator, and dishwasher), plenty of cabinets, granite countertops, in unit laundry, hardwood floors, large/ relaxing living area, a master bedroom with large closet, 2 additional bedrooms, and 2 full bathrooms! Conveniently located near many schools/ universities, medical facilities, shopping, restaurants/ bars, public transportation, etc.
